keyMoments.title: Sanjuan Wolf Debuts at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Sanjuan Wolf, the Colossal Battleship, appears as one of Blackbeard's Level 6 recruits from Impel Down. His massive size rivals the Marine Headquarters building itself.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the most physically imposing characters in One Piece, demonstrating the caliber of criminals Blackbeard recruited from Impel Down's most secure level.

relationships.description: Sanjuan Wolf serves as one of the Ten Titanic Captains under Marshall D. Teach.

evolutionMoments.description: Wolf appears as one of Blackbeard's newly recruited Level 6 prisoners.

reveals.information: Sanjuan Wolf, known as 'Colossal Battleship', is a legendary criminal freed from Impel Down Level 6
Member of the Blackbeard Pirates as one of the Ten Titanic Captains

keyMoments.title: Catarina Devon Debuts at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Catarina Devon, the Crescent Moon Hunter, appears as one of Blackbeard's Level 6 recruits. She is noted as the most dangerous female pirate ever imprisoned in Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a major female antagonist and demonstrates Blackbeard's success in recruiting the most notorious criminals in history.

relationships.description: Catarina Devon serves as one of the Ten Titanic Captains under Marshall D. Teach.

evolutionMoments.description: Devon appears as one of Blackbeard's newly recruited Level 6 prisoners.

reveals.information: Catarina Devon, known as 'Crescent Moon Hunter', is the most dangerous female pirate ever imprisoned in Impel Down
Member of the Blackbeard Pirates as one of the Ten Titanic Captains

keyMoments.title: Avalo Pizarro Debuts at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Avalo Pizarro, the Corrupt King, makes his first appearance as one of Blackbeard's Level 6 recruits from Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Adds another powerful member to Blackbeard's crew, showing the strength of his newly expanded pirate organization.

relationships.description: Avalo Pizarro serves as one of the Ten Titanic Captains under Marshall D. Teach.

evolutionMoments.description: Pizarro appears as one of Blackbeard's newly recruited Level 6 prisoners.

reveals.information: Avalo Pizarro, known as 'Corrupt King', is a legendary criminal freed from Impel Down Level 6
Member of the Blackbeard Pirates as one of the Ten Titanic Captains

keyMoments.title: Vasco Shot Debuts at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Vasco Shot, the Heavy Drinker, appears as one of Blackbeard's Level 6 recruits from Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Completes the introduction of Blackbeard's main Level 6 recruits, establishing the full strength of his expanded crew.

relationships.description: Vasco Shot serves as one of the Ten Titanic Captains under Marshall D. Teach.

evolutionMoments.description: Shot appears as one of Blackbeard's newly recruited Level 6 prisoners.

reveals.information: Vasco Shot, known as 'Heavy Drinker', is a legendary criminal freed from Impel Down Level 6
Member of the Blackbeard Pirates as one of the Ten Titanic Captains
